articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Dragon Ball Z sub is available on Crunchyroll now
articles.description: The subbed version of Dragon Ball Z is available on Crunchyroll now. Earlier this year, the dubbed versions Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, and Dragon Ball GT were added to the anime streaming service.
articles.content: The version of Dragon Ball Z subbedin the original Japanese is now available on Crunchyroll in all English-speaking regions, except the U.K., Ireland, and Nordics. Earlier this year, Crunchyroll adde… [+900 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Pretty Little Liars and Riverdale exist in the same universe
articles.description: In Pretty Little Liars: Original Sin, the Liars go to Rosewood, the town in the original Pretty Liars show, and then someone references Riverdale. Creator Robert Aguirre-Sacasa confirms the shows exist in the same universe.
articles.content: On the newest episode of Pretty Little Liars: Original Sin a spinoff of the 2010 Freeform show the characters return to Rosewood, the town from the first series. Its there that the main characters le… [+3304 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Some Destiny 2 Exotics will be reworked for season 18 on Aug. 23
articles.description: Bungie revealed some reworks to popular Exotics in this week’s blog, such as Le Monarque, Thunderlord, Dead Man’s Tale, and more.
articles.content: With the upcoming Bungie showcase, season 18, and a reprised original Destiny raid less than two weeks away, Destiny 2 fans have a lot to be excited for in August. But ahead of the reveal, Bungie has… [+2349 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Metal Slug Tactics delayed, will release in 2023
articles.description: Metal Slug Tactics, the first strategy game set in the Metal Slug universe, won’t release until next year. This is the second tactics game to be delayed this week, with Marvel’s Midnight Suns getting delayed on Monday
articles.content: Dotemu wont release Metal Slug Tactics this year after all, the publisher revealed via Twitter Thursday morning. Instead, the tactics game will launch sometime in 2023 in order to make it as explosiv… [+828 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Dragon Ball skins finally come to Fortnite next week
articles.description: Following in Naruto’s footsteps, Dragon Ball characters will come to Fortnite on Aug. 16. Epic hasn’t revealed which characters will get skins, but Goku and Vegeta are pretty safe bets
articles.content: Dragon Ball characters are finally coming to Fortnite, Epic revealed via Twitter on Thursday morning. The announcement tweet shows Shenron the glowing wish dragon thats summoned out of the titular dr… [+1080 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: NBA 2K23 brings back The Jordan Challenge, a video game celebration of a hall-of-fame career
articles.description: NBA 2K23, launching Sept. 8 on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, and PC, will include an expanded version of The Jordan Challenge game mode, which first appeared in NBA 2K11.
articles.content: It seems difficult to get authentically fired up over a superstar who is so well known and whose career highlights are so familiar as Michael Jordan. But I invite sports fans to watch this trailer fo… [+6428 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: NBA 2K23’s The Jordan Challenge: All 15 moments from Michael Jordan’s career
articles.description: NBA 2K23 will bring back The Jordan Challenge, a recreation of Michael Jordan’s greatest moments as a collegian and NBA superstar. There are 15 games in the challenge.
articles.content:
NBA 2K23 will bring back the series celebration of Michael Jordans greatest feats with The Jordan Challenge, adding five more games to the original set of 10 that NBA 2K11 offered 12 years ago.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Kirby’s Dream Buffet gameplay overview shows modes, Kirby Car Cake Hat
articles.description: Nintendo’s brand-new Kirby game for Nintendo Switch, Kirby’s Dream Buffet, is all about eating strawberries, cakes, and other sweets. A new gameplay video overview shows the game’s modes, unlockables, and even a Mouthful Mode Kirby Car cake hat.
articles.content: Kirbys Dream Buffet is headed to Nintendo Switch next week, sending Kirby into a land of oversized sweets. The stated goal is to compete against other Kirbys to eat multiples of his weight in strawbe… [+1490 chars]

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: PlayStation Plus Game Catalog games for August include Bugsnax, Dead by Daylight
articles.description: On August 16, PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium members will get 11 new games in the Game Catalog, including three Yakuza titles, Metro Exodus, Ghost Recon Wildlands and Trials of Mana
articles.content: Sony has announced the games that will be added to the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog on August 16 for all Extra and Premium members. As previously announced, the headline additions are Yakuza 0, Yaku… [+998 chars]

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Tower of Fantasy is perfect for recreating Genshin Impact characters
articles.description: Tower of Fantasy is a new free-to-play open world adventure from Hotta Studio and Level Infinite. People are already using the game’s character creator to recreate characters like Amber, Keqing, and Zhongli from Genshin Impact.
